mapper.sql: id, channel_id, order_id, vin, brand_name, dealer_id, status, time, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into yq_order (id, channel_id, order_id, vin, brand_name, dealer_id, status, time, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update yq_order
channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yq_order set channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealer_id = #{dealerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select group_concat(t.total) FROM ( select count(*) total FROM yq_order union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=0 union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=1 union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=2 union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=3 union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=4 union all select count(*) total FROM yq_order WHERE `status`=5) t

select count(*) from (SELECT a.*,b.channel_name FROM (SELECT channel_id, COUNT(*) total, COUNT(`status` = 0 OR NULL) checking, COUNT(`status` = 1 OR NULL) querying, COUNT(`status` = 2 OR NULL) success, COUNT(`status` = 3 OR NULL) fail, COUNT(`status` = 4 OR NULL) reject, COUNT(`status` = 5 OR NULL) norecord FROM yq_order WHERE 1=1
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{fromTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{toTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY channel_id) a LEFT JOIN channel b ON a.channel_id=b.id) c where 1=1
and c.channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from (SELECT a.*,b.channel_name FROM (SELECT channel_id, COUNT(*) total, COUNT(`status` = 0 OR NULL) checking, COUNT(`status` = 1 OR NULL) querying, COUNT(`status` = 2 OR NULL) success, COUNT(`status` = 3 OR NULL) fail, COUNT(`status` = 4 OR NULL) reject, COUNT(`status` = 5 OR NULL) norecord FROM yq_order WHERE 1=1
and create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{fromTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{toTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY channel_id) a LEFT JOIN channel b ON a.channel_id=b.id) c where 1=1
and c.channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
